document.full_text: alberto contador won the third stage of the volta of catalunya, taking the overall lead a day before cycling's governing body decides whether to challenge a previous decision to clear him of doping.
document.title: sports briefing | cycling: contador takes lead; decision due
lines_and_colors: alberto contador won the third stage of the volta of catalunya, taking the overall lead a day before cycling's governing body decides whether to challenge a previous decision to clear him of doping.
